This piece depicts a community building and growing together, connecting, supporting each other and flourishing. 

Martha Olivia is a pattern designer and illustrator from the North of England. Her work consists of layering and shading lush florals to create immersive and bold designs, often expressing themes of nature, culture and dreamlike scenes.
